summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6023 for the improvement of The Alley in Blocks 1, 2 and 3, B. F. Day's 1st Addition, being a continuous alley between Fremont Avenue and Evanston Avenue from Bowdoin Place to North 42nd Street; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 81313, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
